import React from 'react' import Header from '../Header/Header' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import "./ViewCart.css" export default function ViewCart(props) { const { cartItems, totalAmount, isModalOpen, removeFromCart, handleAddToCart, toggleCartModal, openModal, closeModal, handleIncrease, handleDecrease, handleDeleteAll } = props return (

Your Cart

Home / Your Cart
{cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

CONTINUE SHOPPING
) : (
{cartItems.map((item, index) => (
))}
PRODUCT
QUANTITY
SUBTOTAL:
{item.title}

{(item.quantity || 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}
£ {(item.price * (item.quantity || 1)).toFixed(2)}

Do you want a gift wrap ?

 £ Only 2.00

ADD ORDER NOTE

{/* You can add any additional content for the right side */}
)}
) }
